name: Stunt Monster Truck Simulator
description:
Go anywhere you want in the sandbox arena whilst collecting fuel and health pickups to keep your truck going, your fuel is always running down so find as much as you can. The pickups are hidden everywhere around the arena, take on the obstacles and challenge games including Football and Bowling as you try to find them all! Earn stunt score as you drive around by performing jumps and drifts.

Think you can master all of the obstacles and challenges in the arena?

- Free-roaming game play, go wherever you like!
- Physics-based challenges including Football, Bowling and a Ball Pit
- Advanced driving engine allows for insane jumps and drifting
- Drive up walls and even ceilings if you go fast enough!
